entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: json_actix #43438
  • Blazor Component doesn't re-render after unhandled exception in event handler #43433
  • Perf improvement: caching, json_nodejs #43430

Closed

  • Component doesn't call StateHasChanged() after event in case of exception #43432
  • When I use EditForm with a model in a .NET MAUI Blazor, I get an error stating "EditForm requires either a Model parameter, or an EditContext parameter, please provide one of these." #43400

PullRequests

Created

  • Triggering IConnectionLifetimeNotificationFeature on GoAway #43431
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43437
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #43413
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • [SignalR] Avoid blocking common InvokeAsync usage #42796
    area-signalr

Updated

  • Update SDK #43028
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1957437 #43428
    area-infrastructure
  • Retry a few tests #43422
    area-infrastructure
